problem_names:
lemma
  basic_gt_and_gt_le_gt: "(\<lambda>t s. t >\<^sub>t s \<and> local.kbo_std.gt t s) \<le> kbo_std.gt" and
  gt_and_basic_gt_le_basic_gt: "(\<lambda>t s. local.kbo_std.gt t s \<and> t >\<^sub>t s) \<le> (>\<^sub>t)"
lemma basic_gt_iff_gt: "t >\<^sub>t s \<longleftrightarrow> kbo_std.gt t s"
theorem gt_trans: "u >\<^sub>t t \<Longrightarrow> t >\<^sub>t s \<Longrightarrow> u >\<^sub>t s"
theorem gt_proper_sub: "proper_sub s t \<Longrightarrow> t >\<^sub>t s"
theorem gt_compat_fun: "t' >\<^sub>t t \<Longrightarrow> App s t' >\<^sub>t App s t"
theorem gt_compat_arg: "s' >\<^sub>t s \<Longrightarrow> App s' t >\<^sub>t App s t"
lemma wt_subst: "wary_subst \<rho> \<Longrightarrow> wt (subst \<rho> s) = wt s + kbo_std.extra_wt \<rho> s"
theorem gt_subst: "wary_subst \<rho> \<Longrightarrow> t >\<^sub>t s \<Longrightarrow> subst \<rho> t >\<^sub>t subst \<rho> s"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wt s = local.kbo_std.wt s

lemma
  basic_gt_and_gt_le_gt: "(\<lambda>t s. t >\<^sub>t s \<and> local.kbo_std.gt t s) \<le> kbo_std.gt" and
  gt_and_basic_gt_le_basic_gt: "(\<lambda>t s. local.kbo_std.gt t s \<and> t >\<^sub>t s) \<le> (>\<^sub>t)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>t s. t >\<^sub>t s \<and> local.kbo_std.gt t s)
    \<le> local.kbo_std.gt &&&
    (\<lambda>t s. local.kbo_std.gt t s \<and> t >\<^sub>t s)
    \<le> (>\<^sub>t)
lemma basic_gt_iff_gt: "t >\<^sub>t s \<longleftrightarrow> kbo_std.gt t s"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (t >\<^sub>t s) = local.kbo_std.gt t s

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. t >\<^sub>t s \<Longrightarrow> local.kbo_std.gt t s
 2. local.kbo_std.gt t s \<Longrightarrow> t >\<^sub>t s

proof (state)
this:
  t >\<^sub>t s

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. t >\<^sub>t s \<Longrightarrow> local.kbo_std.gt t s
 2. local.kbo_std.gt t s \<Longrightarrow> t >\<^sub>t s

proof (prove)
using this:
  t >\<^sub>t s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.kbo_std.gt t s

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>t s.
       \<lbrakk>vars_mset s \<subseteq># vars_mset t; wt s < wt t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> local.kbo_std.gt t s
 2. \<And>t s.
       \<lbrakk>vars_mset s \<subseteq># vars_mset t; wt t = wt s;
        head t >\<^sub>h\<^sub>d head s\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> local.kbo_std.gt t s
 3. \<And>t s.
       \<lbrakk>vars_mset s \<subseteq># vars_mset t; wt t = wt s;
        head t = head s;
        \<forall>f\<in>local.ground_heads (head s).
           extf f
            (\<lambda>x1 x2. x1 >\<^sub>t x2 \<and> local.kbo_std.gt x1 x2)
            (args t) (args s)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> local.kbo_std.gt t s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. t >\<^sub>t s

proof (state)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. \<And>t s.
       \<lbrakk>vars_mset s \<subseteq># vars_mset t;
        local.kbo_std.wt s < local.kbo_std.wt t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> t >\<^sub>t s
 2. \<And>t s.
       \<lbrakk>local.kbo_std.wt t = local.kbo_std.wt s;
        \<not> head t \<le>\<ge>\<^sub>h\<^sub>d head s; num_args t = 1;
        \<exists>f\<in>local.ground_heads (head t).
           \<infinity> = 1 \<and> wt_sym f = 0;
        local.kbo_std.gt (arg t) s \<and> arg t >\<^sub>t s \<or>
        arg t = s\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> t >\<^sub>t s
 3. \<And>t s.
       \<lbrakk>vars_mset s \<subseteq># vars_mset t;
        local.kbo_std.wt t = local.kbo_std.wt s;
        head t >\<^sub>h\<^sub>d head s\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> t >\<^sub>t s
 4. \<And>t s.
       \<lbrakk>vars_mset s \<subseteq># vars_mset t;
        local.kbo_std.wt t = local.kbo_std.wt s; head t = head s;
        \<forall>f\<in>local.ground_heads (head t).
           extf f
            (\<lambda>x1 x2. local.kbo_std.gt x1 x2 \<and> x1 >\<^sub>t x2)
            (args t) (args s)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> t >\<^sub>t s

  \<forall>f\<in>local.ground_heads (head t_).
     extf f (\<lambda>x1 x2. local.kbo_std.gt x1 x2 \<and> x1 >\<^sub>t x2)
      (args t_) (args s_)
  extf ?f (\<lambda>t s. local.kbo_std.gt t s \<and> t >\<^sub>t s)
  \<le> extf ?f (>\<^sub>t)

 1. t_ >\<^sub>t s_
